---
title: Push Day
---

**GOAL:** Moderate (8-12 reps) to low (15-20 reps) weight. Reach failure, then **grind** (essentially slow down) while **maintaining form.**

::: panel-tabset
## Chest

| Machine             | Cable                                  | DB                   |
|-------------------|----------------------------------|-------------------|
| **Chest press**     | Pec fly (over, under, centered)        | Chest press          |
| Incline chest press | Chest press (shoulder-width, push out) | Incline chest press  |
| **Pec fly**         |                                        | Pec fly              |
|                     |                                        | **Around the world** |

\+ **push-ups** (chest focus = wide arm position)

## Tri

| Machine          | Cable               | DB                 |
|------------------|---------------------|--------------------|
| Tricep pushdown  | **Tricep pulldown** | Tricep hammer curl |
| Tricep extension | Tricep extension    | **Skull crushers** |
|                  |                     |                    |

\+ push-ups (tri focus = arms shoulder-width apart)

\+ **dips**
